content: Expert Profile: Nitin Nitin | Research Directory Nitin Nitin , PHD Associate Professor Educator James A. Rhodes Hall812CCincinnati, Ohio 45221-0030Phone +1 (513) 556 7619Email nitinfu@ucmail.uc.edu +1 (513) 556 7619EmailDownload V-Card I am currently working as an Associate Professor Educator-Full Time in the College of Engineering and Applied Sciences at the University of Cincinnati. In the past I have worked as Associate Professor-Full Time of Information Systems and Analytics at IIM Shillong, Meghalaya, INDIA. During my tenure at IIM Shillong, I have also served as Chairperson for the two Areas {(Information Systems and Analytics) & (IT Services and Website Committee)}. During 2017-2018, I worked as Professor Educator in the Department of EECS at University of Cincinnati, OH and during 2010-2011 as First Tier Bank Professor in the Peter Kiewit Institute at University of Nebraska at Omaha, NE, USA. I have started my professional career in June 1997; in December 2001, I received B.Engg. in Computer Science & Engineering [Hons.] from Dr. B.R. Ambedkar University, Agra. In 2003 I graduated in M.Engg. in Software Engineering from Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology (Deemed University), Patiala, Punjab, INDIA. In September 2008, I received Ph.D. in Computer Science & Engineering from Jaypee University of Information Technology, INDIA and University of Florida (UF), Gainesville, FL, USA under faculty-student exchange program, specifically I have completed 12 credits course work from UF. Finally in May 2013, I received D.Sc. in Computer Science & Engineering from Uttarakhand Technical University, Dehradun, INDIA. I completed the partial research work that was related to my D.Sc. at University of Nebraska at Omaha (UNO), NE, USA. I was successful in simulating all my research work on a Supercomputer called Firefly. I am an IBM certified engineer, a Life Member of IAENG, Senior Member of IEEE, ACM & IACSIT and Member of SIAM and ACIS. Currently I am focused in the research areas of AI, ML, Big Data Analytics, Hybrid Blockchain Technology, Hybrid Smart Contracts, Interconnection Networks, Networks-on-Chip, Systems-on-Chip, Systems-in-Packages, Multiprocessor-Systems-on-Chip, Parallel and Distributed Computing, Finite State Testing of GUIs, CMC in Business and Negotiations for the last 24 years, which resulted in 200+ academic research papers in high-impact refereed International Journals & Transactions, Book Chapters, Symposium, Conferences and Position, Research reports, such as Elsevier, Springer, Taylor & Francis, Wiley, IEEE, ACM, Sage, CRC, IOS Press, MDPI, Tech Science Press, 1 granted Australian and 2 granted Indian Patents, 7 Books, 12 PhDs, 60 Master’s Thesis and 60+ Academic & Research Awards. I am also an Associate Editor of the International Journal of Parallel, Emergent and Distributed Systems, Taylor and Francis, UK and IEEE Access, IEEE, USA. In addition to this, I am also serving as referee for the Journal of Parallel and Distributed Computing; Computer Communications; Computers and Electrical Engineering; Mathematical and Computer Modelling-Elsevier Sciences, The Journal of Supercomputing, Springer and International Journal of System Science, Taylor & Francis. Doctor of Science (D.Sc.) : Veer Madho Singh Bhandari Uttarakhand Technical University, UK, INDIA UK, India, 2013 (Computer Science and Engineering) Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.): Jaypee University of Information Technology, HP, INDIA/University of Florida, FL, USA 2008 (Computer Science and Engineering ) Master of Engineering (M.E.): Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology, PB, INDIA PB, India, 2003 (Software Engineering) Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.): Dr. B.R.
